subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh had 23 points and 13 rebounds, Andrea Bargnani scored 22 and the Toronto Raptors beat the visiting Dallas Mavericks, 110-88.
snippet: Chris Bosh had 23 points and 13 rebounds, Andrea Bargnani scored 22 and the Toronto Raptors beat the visiting Dallas Mavericks, 110-88.
